subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Shiffrin, who won a gold medal in slalom at the Sochi Games, wants to compete for overall skiing titles on the World Cup circuit and will next focus on her super-G skills.
snippet: Shiffrin, who won a gold medal in slalom at the Sochi Games, wants to compete for overall skiing titles on the World Cup circuit and will next focus on her super-G skills.
